# BarcodeStyle

# Properties

# align - Align

# barHeight - Number

# font - any

# fontSize - Number

# humanReadableHAlign - TextAlign

# humanReadableVAlign - HumanReadableLocation

# modWidth - Number

# rotate - Number

# rotateBasePoint - BasePoint

# scale - Number

# Methods

# font(String | Font font=HELVETICA, Number size=14)

  • Props:
    • font- String | Font, defaults to "HELVETICA"
    • size- Number, defaults to "14"
  • Returns: BarcodeStyle

# align(Align align)

  • Props:
    • align- Align
  • Returns: BarcodeStyle

# barHeight(Number barHeight)

  • Props:
    • barHeight- Number
  • Returns: BarcodeStyle

# humanReadableHAlign(TextAlign humanReadableHAlign)

  • Props:
    • humanReadableHAlign- TextAlign
  • Returns: BarcodeStyle

# humanReadableVAlign(HumanReadableLocation humanReadableVAlign)

  • Props:
    • humanReadableVAlign- HumanReadableLocation
  • Returns: BarcodeStyle

# modWidth(Number modWidth)

  • Props:
    • modWidth- Number
  • Returns: BarcodeStyle

# rotate(Number rotate)

  • Props:
    • rotate- Number
  • Returns: BarcodeStyle

# rotateBasePoint(BasePoint rotateBasePoint)

  • Props:
    • rotateBasePoint- BasePoint
  • Returns: BarcodeStyle

# scale(Number scale)

  • Props:
    • scale- Number
  • Returns: BarcodeStyle
